properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, Name of matchless splendor! Name all other names above! Glorious Son of God incarnate, King of kings, and Lord of love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Name that to our hearts is nearest, Here the stricken soul doth hide; Name that to our hearts is dearest, As in Jesus we confide.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: “Call Him Jesus!” He shall save us From the tyranny of sin; From its condemnation save us, From iniquity within.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thanks we give, and adoration, Every day and every hour, For an uttermost salvation, Freedom from sin’s guilt and power.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Jesus! sweetest note of any In the lowly pilgrim’s song; Jesus! the triumphant music Of the bright angelic throng.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Earth to Him her face upraises, Knows Him as the great I AM! Heaven resounds with Jesus’ praises, Glory to the bleeding Lamb!
